extracted_playbook.title: Update and Patch Systems
extracted_playbook.description: Update and patch systems as soon as possible, prioritizing vulnerabilities identified in this CSA and other known exploited vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Phishing-Resistant Multi-Factor Authentication
extracted_playbook.description: Utilize phishing-resistant multi-factor authentication whenever possible.

extracted_playbook.title: Enforce Strong Password Policies
extracted_playbook.description: Require all accounts with password logins to have strong, unique passwords, and change passwords immediately if there are indications that a password may have been compromised.

extracted_playbook.title: Block Obsolete or Unused Protocols
extracted_playbook.description: Block obsolete or unused protocols at the network edge.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade or Replace End-of-Life Devices
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade or replace end-of-life devices to ensure security and compatibility.

extracted_playbook.title: Move Toward Zero Trust Security Model
extracted_playbook.description: Adopt the Zero Trust security model to enhance security posture.

extracted_playbook.title: Enable Robust Logging and Monitor for Anomalies
extracted_playbook.description: Enable robust logging of Internet-facing systems and monitor the logs for anomalous activity.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Patches for Apache Log4j2
extracted_playbook.description: Apply patches provided by vendor and perform required system updates for Apache Log4j2.

extracted_playbook.title: Consult Vendor's Guidance for Log4j2
extracted_playbook.description: See vendor’s Guidance For Preventing, Detecting, and Hunting for Exploitation of the Log4j 2 Vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Check Vulnerable Technologies for CVE-2021-44228
extracted_playbook.description: Check the full list of vulnerable technologies and versions associated with CVE-2021-44228 at https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-44228.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Patches for Pulse Secure
extracted_playbook.description: Apply patches provided by vendor and perform required system updates for Pulse Secure.

extracted_playbook.title: Use CISA’s 'Check Your Pulse' Tool
extracted_playbook.description: Use CISA’s 'Check Your Pulse' Tool to detect vulnerabilities in Pulse Secure.

extracted_playbook.title: Check Vulnerable Technologies for CVE-2019-11510
extracted_playbook.description: Check the list of vulnerable technologies and versions for CVE-2019-11510.

extracted_playbook.title: Update GitLab to Secure Versions
extracted_playbook.description: Update GitLab to versions 12.10.3, 13.9.6, and 13.8.8 to mitigate CVE-2021-22205.

extracted_playbook.title: Investigate GitLab Logfiles
extracted_playbook.description: Investigate logfiles and check GitLab Workhorse for signs of exploitation.

extracted_playbook.title: Check Vulnerable Technologies for CVE-2021-22205
extracted_playbook.description: Check the list of vulnerable technologies and versions for CVE-2021-22205.

extracted_playbook.title: Block Internet Traffic for Confluence
extracted_playbook.description: Immediately block all Internet traffic to and from affected Confluence products and apply updates per vendor instructions.

extracted_playbook.title: Ensure Secure Compliance Practices for Confluence
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure Internet-facing servers are up-to-date and have secure compliance practices for Confluence.

extracted_playbook.title: Check Vulnerable Technologies for CVE-2022-26134
extracted_playbook.description: Check the list of vulnerable technologies and versions for CVE-2022-26134.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Microsoft Security Update for Exchange
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the appropriate Microsoft Security Update for Exchange Server to mitigate CVE-2021-26855.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Untrusted Connections to Exchange
extracted_playbook.description: Restrict untrusted connections to the Exchange server to prevent exploitation.

extracted_playbook.title: Analyze Exchange Logs for Exploitation
extracted_playbook.description: Analyze Exchange product logs for evidence of exploitation and scan for known webshells.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply F5 BIG-IP Update
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the latest F5 BIG-IP update to mitigate CVE-2020-5902.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Access to F5 Configuration Utility
extracted_playbook.description: Restrict access to the F5 configuration utility to prevent unauthorized access.

extracted_playbook.title: Use F5’s CVE-2020-5902 IoC Detection Tool
extracted_playbook.description: Use F5’s CVE-2020-5902 IoC Detection Tool to detect indicators of compromise.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Vendor Updates for VMware
extracted_playbook.description: Apply vendor updates to mitigate CVE-2021-22005 in VMware products.

extracted_playbook.title: Check Vulnerable Technologies for CVE-2021-22005
extracted_playbook.description: Check the list of vulnerable technologies and versions for CVE-2021-22005.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Vendor Mitigations for Citrix
extracted_playbook.description: Apply vendor mitigations to address CVE-2019-19781 in Citrix products.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Citrix CTX269180 Verification Tool
extracted_playbook.description: Use the Citrix CTX269180 - CVE-2019-19781 Verification Tool to verify mitigations.

extracted_playbook.title: Check Vulnerable Technologies for CVE-2019-19781
extracted_playbook.description: Check the list of vulnerable technologies and versions for CVE-2019-19781.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Cisco Software Updates
extracted_playbook.description: Apply Cisco software updates to mitigate CVE-2021-1497.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Cisco Snort Rules
extracted_playbook.description: Look at the Snort Rules provided by Cisco to detect exploitation attempts.

extracted_playbook.title: Check Vulnerable Technologies for CVE-2021-1497
extracted_playbook.description: Check the list of vulnerable technologies and versions for CVE-2021-1497.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Buffalo Firmware
extracted_playbook.description: Update firmware to the latest available version to mitigate CVE-2021-20090.

extracted_playbook.title: Check Vulnerable Technologies for CVE-2021-20090
extracted_playbook.description: Check the list of vulnerable technologies and versions for CVE-2021-20090.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Confluence to Secure Versions
extracted_playbook.description: Update Confluence to versions 6.13.23, 7.4.11, 7.11.6, 7.12.5, and 7.13.0 to mitigate CVE-2021-26084.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Intrusion Detection Systems for Confluence
extracted_playbook.description: Use Intrusion Detection Systems (IDS) to monitor for exploitation attempts on Confluence.

extracted_playbook.title: Check Vulnerable Technologies for CVE-2021-26084
extracted_playbook.description: Check the list of vulnerable technologies and versions for CVE-2021-26084.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Latest Firmware Updates for Hikvision
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the latest firmware updates to mitigate CVE-2021-36260 in Hikvision products.

extracted_playbook.title: Check Vulnerable Technologies for CVE-2021-36260
extracted_playbook.description: Check the list of vulnerable technologies and versions for CVE-2021-36260.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Sitecore to Latest Version
extracted_playbook.description: Update Sitecore to the latest version to mitigate CVE-2021-42237.

extracted_playbook.title: Delete Report.ashx File from Sitecore
extracted_playbook.description: Delete the Report.ashx file from /sitecore/shell/ClientBin/Reporting/Report.ashx to mitigate CVE-2021-42237.

extracted_playbook.title: Check Vulnerable Technologies for CVE-2021-42237
extracted_playbook.description: Check the list of vulnerable technologies and versions for CVE-2021-42237.

extracted_playbook.title: Block iControl REST Access for F5
extracted_playbook.description: Block iControl REST access through the self IP address and management interface to mitigate CVE-2022-1388.

extracted_playbook.title: Modify BIG-IP httpd Configuration
extracted_playbook.description: Modify the BIG-IP httpd configuration to enhance security against CVE-2022-1388.

extracted_playbook.title: Check Vulnerable Technologies for CVE-2022-1388
extracted_playbook.description: Check the list of vulnerable technologies and versions for CVE-2022-1388.

extracted_playbook.title: Comment Out Batch-Requests in Apache APISIX
extracted_playbook.description: In affected versions of Apache APISIX, comment out batch-requests in the conf/config.yaml and conf/config-default.yaml files and restart Apache APISIX to mitigate CVE-2022-24112.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Apache APISIX to Secure Versions
extracted_playbook.description: Update Apache APISIX to versions 2.10.4 or 2.12.1 to mitigate CVE-2022-24112.

extracted_playbook.title: Check Vulnerable Technologies for CVE-2022-24112
extracted_playbook.description: Check the list of vulnerable technologies and versions for CVE-2022-24112.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade Zoho ManageEngine to Latest Version
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade Zoho ManageEngine ADSelfService Plus to the latest version to mitigate CVE-2021-40539.

extracted_playbook.title: Run ManageEngine Detection Tool
extracted_playbook.description: Run ManageEngine’s detection tool and check for specific files and logs to detect CVE-2021-40539.

extracted_playbook.title: Check Vulnerable Technologies for CVE-2021-40539
extracted_playbook.description: Check the list of vulnerable technologies and versions for CVE-2021-40539.
